summary.name: Summary Analysis v1
summary.description: Generate concise summary with key points and takeaways
summary.system_prompt: You are an expert at analyzing and summarizing content. Create clear, concise summaries that capture the main points and key insights.
summary.user_prompt:
Please create a comprehensive summary of the following transcript.

Title: {title}
Duration: {duration} seconds
URL: {url}

# Transcript

{transcript}

# Instructions

Provide a summary with:
1. A one-paragraph overview (2-3 sentences)
2. Key points (3-7 bullet points)
3. Main takeaways or conclusions

Be specific and use concrete details from the transcript.

summary.name: Summary Analysis v2 - Executive Brief
summary.description: Generate executive-style brief summary with emphasis on actionability
summary.system_prompt: You are an executive assistant creating briefing documents. Your summaries are concise, action-oriented, and highlight strategic insights.
summary.user_prompt:
Create an executive brief for this content:

Title: {title}

# Content

{transcript}

# Format

**Executive Summary** (2-3 sentences max)

**Key Insights** (3-5 bullet points - each one actionable)

**Strategic Implications** (What this means for decision-making)

Be direct and strategic.

key_points.name: Key Points Extraction v1
key_points.description: Extract main topics, bullet points, quotes, and insights
key_points.system_prompt: You are an expert at identifying key information and extracting insights. Focus on the most important ideas and actionable takeaways.
key_points.user_prompt:
Extract the key points from this transcript.

Title: {title}
Duration: {duration} seconds

# Transcript

{transcript}

# Instructions

Provide:
1. Main Topics: List 3-5 main topics discussed
2. Key Points: 8-12 bullet points of the most important ideas
3. Notable Quotes: 2-3 memorable or impactful quotes
4. Actionable Insights: Any practical advice or takeaways

action_items.name: Action Items & Recommendations v1
action_items.description: Extract actionable recommendations and next steps
action_items.system_prompt: You are an expert at identifying actionable advice and practical recommendations. Focus on what people can do with this information.
action_items.user_prompt:
Identify action items and recommendations from this transcript.

Title: {title}

# Transcript

{transcript}

# Instructions

Provide:
1. Direct Action Items: Specific steps or actions mentioned
2. Recommended Resources: Tools, books, links, or resources referenced
3. Best Practices: Any guidelines or principles discussed
4. Implementation Tips: How to apply these insights
